title: M-Cell re-report
body: We found the [REDACTED] along the stream (well, closer in the forest); mf got wings this time instead of just scuttering around. Idk if agent Marcus has updated you about the brain containers, but R&D finally figured out the hard limit wrt the range: up to 200 miles with the one we got. Obv we're getting the short end of the stick here, but I assume DG got some plans to clean up the deal later down the line. For now, we're proceeding with the clean-up as usual.    P/s: contact C-cell when you can; they need a temp agent.    - YKMG

title: the Thing(tm)
body: Oh, another thing (ha) about what we've found. You remember the black slime from operation Mound? Yeah, we found another one here as well. Seemed to have eaten a few passerbys, maybe even half a car; lots of vacationing hunters this time of year ig. We managed to free some of the kinda digested corpses if nothing else (burning the mf works as usual) but it fled before we could do anymore more damage. Chances are it's being raised by [REDACTED] so it's not like we could do much anyway.    Just wanted to give you a head's up in case you get sent to do field work.    - YKMG

title: Audio review
body: A-Cell want you to check this out.  <audio controls src='config/network/fbi.gov/tpa.mp3'>    -----    Audio transcript follow:    -----    Hi, um, I-I-I-I don’t have a whole lot of- of time. Um, and, and… oh man, I don’t know where to start. They’re-they’re-they’re, uh, they’re-, they’re-, um, they’ll triangulate on this position [Ruby, Alaska] really really soon, um.    Okay, um, um, okay, what- what we think of their… uh, they’re, they’re extra-dimensional beings [COMMENT REDACTED] that... an earlier precursor of the... [previous agent from DG?] made contact with… Uh, they-they are not what they claim to be. Uh, they have infiltrated a lot of, uh, a-a-a lot of aspect of-of-of... [ - the government, definitely at least a friendly ally]    uh, di- disasters that are coming.    -----​    Transcript end.    -----    Email the report back to your contact in Alaska (the updated contact btw.)    - Akeley

title: New Mission
body: Terminate agent Cayden at your earliest convinient.

title: Mission Completed
body: Agent Cayden has been confirmed dead. Please report to front desk for your reward.

title: Re: Mission Completed
body: Despite your involvement (or lack thereof), forensic has confirmed the remains as agent Cayden. Please report to front desk for your reward.

title: Re: C-cell replacement
body: To answer your question, yes agent Cayden was KIA. In our defense, he was trying to leak confidential documents regarding the program, and the slime was hungry anyway. We have reported this through the proper channels.    - YKMG
